document.full_text: the cuckoo finch's habit of laying its eggs in other birds' nests provokes a variety of defense mechanisms in three species of warblers in zambia, researchers say.
document.title: observatory: warblers have ways to resist impostor eggs
lines_and_colors: the cuckoo finch's habit of laying its eggs in other birds' nests provokes a variety of defense mechanisms in three species of warblers in zambia, researchers say.
